name: Dash & Smash
description:
Blobby is all alone and wants to find the place where all the other blobs have disappeared. So he goes out into the dangerous world to get to them. He has to overcome a lot of obstacles to reach the others.

Blobby is a small blob with the ability to dash in any direction with the help of a small spirit that surrounds him, but be careful with the recoil that pushes him in the opposite direction. Try to reach the end of each level as quickly as possible without bursting. The world is full of obstacles that can make you burst.

Information:

This is a work in progress. I will upload the finished game when I am done :)

Controls:

Just press the space button
